analysis: The documents in this cluster are all executive orders issued by President Harry S. Truman. They primarily deal with amendments, revocations, or extensions of previous executive orders or regulations. The subject matter varies widely, covering areas such as military affairs, compensation, housing, transportation, and government personnel. A common thread is the adjustment of existing rules and procedures in response to changing circumstances, such as the post-war period and national emergencies.
title: Adjustments to Regulations and Executive Actions
